The Year of Return Ghana 2021 (Panafest Festival)

The fun continues! Ghana, the beacon of Africa continues to shine and welcomes all in the diaspora, especially Black Americans to migrate to Africa and to resettle 'HOME'

Read More

Lots of Tourist Attractions

Beyond The Return - Ghana 2020 - 2030.

Ghana prides itself in having diverse wildlife, beautiful waterfalls: Kintampo waterfalls and the biggest waterfall in west Africa, Wli waterfalls. It's a wonder to behold! You can also visit the largest man-made lake in the world by surface area, Lake Volta. We have nature reserves and national parks and historic slave castles that tell the gruesome story of how the slave trade unfolded centuries back.
